EmailTemplate.name: Execution Plan Cancelled
EmailTemplate.subject: Execution Plan Cancelled
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Execution Plan Cancelled Notification:
Please be advised that the following Execution Plan has been Cancelled.
Headquarters: {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Headquarters__c}
Click this link https://freestyle.my.salesforce.com to open the FET site. Then click {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.Link} to be directed to the specific record referenced above.
